Topic Module
[DDS API Reference]

Contains the DDSTopic, DDSContentFilteredTopic, and DDSMultiTopic classes, the DDSTopicListener interface, and more generally, all that is needed by an application to define DDSTopic objects and attach QoS policies to them. More...


Modules

 Topic
 DDSTopic entity and associated elements
 User Data Type Support
 Defines generic classes and macros to support user data types.
 Type Code Support
 This module defines support for IDL type codes, a part of the CORBA specification which describes a mechanism to represent IDL types at runtime. RTI Data Distribution Service can use type codes to send information about types on the wire.
 DDS-Specific Primitive Types
 Basic DDS value types for use in user data types.

Detailed Description

Contains the DDSTopic, DDSContentFilteredTopic, and DDSMultiTopic classes, the DDSTopicListener interface, and more generally, all that is needed by an application to define DDSTopic objects and attach QoS policies to them.

"DCPS Topic package"
